name: Chaos Vectors
description:
Chaos Vector Wars

Controls:

  • Direction: A S W D 
  • Shoot:  Arrow Keys 
  • Bomb:  Space

Shoot low-res vector shapes. Upgrade cannons, detonate bombs. Protect your grid.

How low can you survive?
Can you top 1,000,000 points?

* Retro, Low-Res, Vector graphics
* Endless Shoot-em up
